_header: I have in heart and fresh in mind

CamJes13.Transcription:
I haue in loue & freysch & myndethe blod of hym that was so
                    keende
CamJes13.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.212.

BLRoy8Cxii.Transcription:
I have in harte and ffresche in myndeThe blod of hym that was so
                    kynde
BLRoy8Cxii.Editions:
Warner,  Sir George Frederic,  and  Julius P. Gilson, eds.  
             Catalogue of Western Manuscripts in the old Royal and King’s
                Collections.
         4 vols. London: Trustees of the British Museum, 1921: 1.238.
